question: Why are you here?
answers: To make healthy eating habits simple and enjoyable for the whole family.
Lose unnecessary fat, get lean, and build muscles.
Feel better by improving my food habits and gain more energy.
Lost more than 40lbs to achieve a healthy bodyweight for life.
I love eating (A LOT!) but I want to lose weight, and not my sanity.
I want to eat big AND love my diet by adopting a healthy fitness routine for life while eating big meals.
I want to eat big and get ripped.

question: When are you the most hungry?
answers: I'm always hungry (lets go through hydration, we need guidelines with my collagen trick to curb appetite).

question: What's your preferred meal frequency?
answers: Dessert for breakfast, lunch & dinner (most popular).

question: What's your appetite like?
answers: I struggle with portion control and have trouble stopping myself when I feel full.
I have a small appetite and only like/can tolerate smaller meals.
Very small volume due to surgery (i.e weight loss surgery, gastric bypass surgery etc...); many small meals.

question: Do you enjoy cooking or prefer mimimalistic prep?
answers: I like to cook and have time for simple meal prep.
I meal prep on weekends for the whole week.

question: Do you enjoy cooking or prefer mimimalistic prep?
answers: I like to cook and have time for simple meal prep.
I meal prep on weekends for the whole week.

question: Do you have any food intolerances, medical restrictions, or allergies?
What do you struggle with regarding eating healthy?
answers: I stress eat and turn to food for emotional support
I love to eat like a pig but not look like one, like the founder of FD, Pauline Nordin.
I can't control myself around tasty delicious junk food or high caloric meals such as fast food
When I am stressed or sad i turn to sweets and i want to stop that.
I am constanlty in a rush and due to work I am on my feet 12-14 hours a day and have to eat almost all my meals in one or two sittings. I feel guilty that I have to finish my meals late at night.
I have a very stressful life and I snack too much without even realizing it.
I like no-cook, meals because I have no oven;I only have a stove top and/or a microwave oven.
I am a vegan and struggle with making meals I actually enjoy eating.
